alert.note: Alert for Liberty; Polk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 08 at 3:25PM CST until January 08 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Liberty County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Polk County in southeastern Texas... * Until 400 PM CST. * At 325 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Dayton Lakes, or 11 miles southeast of Cleveland, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moss Hill, Tarkington Prairie and Rye. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
